ActorTalk: Where did things go wrong "yesterday"? Galaxy Fashion? Kuroro Coffee? Or was it Stella Brew?
I remember back at Stella Brew, just before the end, Lucia said she hoped I'd confide in her if something was bothering me.
But if she found out, her wish might unknowingly turn into a desire to help me, and it wouldn't be pure anymore.
Am I supposed to fake it better? Fool her completely so she doesn't catch on?
But if I do that... will her wish really come true?
A message from Lucia: "Are you still resting?"
No. That's not what she would want at all.
...I need to focus on fulfilling Lucia's true wish.
